The Result: Massive Inefficiency Across Industries

Organizations are spending millions on manual conversion processes, experiencing project delays, and struggling with data accuracy issues that could be solved with modern AI technology.

How It Works

Our AI-powered conversion process transforms legacy drawings into modern CAD files in just four simple steps, delivering results in minutes instead of hours.

1

Upload

Upload any format - PDF, images, old CAD files, or handwritten drawings

2

AI Processing

Computer vision detects symbols, OCR extracts text, GenAI validates context

3

Validation

Confidence scoring flags items for review, engineering rules validate accuracy

4

Download

Get native CAD files, databases, 3D models, and API integrations
